components/blog/sidebar:
<nav>
    <!-- recent post -->
    {{> components/themevale/sidebar/recent-post}}
    <!-- slider product 
    {{#if products.featured}}
        {{> components/themevale/sidebar/featured-products products=products.featured}}
    {{/if}}-->
    <!-- advertisement image 
    {{> components/themevale/sidebar/advertisement-image}}-->
    <!-- advertisement text 
    {{> components/themevale/sidebar/advertisement-content}}-->
</nav>
components/products/card-sidebar:
{{#if brand.name}}

{{brand.name}}

{{/if}}

{{name}}

{{#if show_rating}}

{{> components/products/ratings rating=rating}}

{{/if}}
{{#or customer (if theme_settings.restrict_to_login '!==' true)}} {{> components/products/price price=price}} {{else}} {{> components/common/login-for-pricing}} {{/or}}
{{#or customer (if theme_settings.restrict_to_login '!==' true)}} {{#if show_cart_action}} {{#if has_options}} {{lang 'products.choose_options'}} {{/if}} {{#if pre_order}} {{lang 'products.pre_order'}} {{/if}} {{#if add_to_cart_url }} {{lang 'products.add_to_cart'}} {{/if}} {{#if out_of_stock_message }} {{out_of_stock_message}} {{/if}} {{/if}} {{/or}}
components/themevale/sidebar/advertiseme:
Custom CMS Block

Custom CMS block displayed at the left sidebar on the Catalog Page. Put your own content here: text, html, images... whatever you like.

There are many similar sample content placeholders across the store. All editable from Theme Editor.
components/themevale/sidebar/featured-pr:
{{lang 'products.featured'}}
{{#each products}}
{{> components/products/card-sidebar theme_settings=../theme_settings customer=../customer show_rating=../settings.show_product_rating show_wishlist=../settings.show_wishlist}}
{{/each}}
components/themevale/sidebar/recent-post:
Recent Posts
{{#each blog.posts}}
{{title}}
{{/each}}
